description: SELECT SNOMED CT code system values describing how frequent an altered mental status occurs.
name: HSPC Altered Mental Status Periodicity Value Set

text.div:
HSPC Altered Mental Status Periodicity Value Set

SELECT SNOMED CT code system values describing how frequent an altered mental status occurs.

Copyright Statement: TBD

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    255227004Recurrent (qualifier value)
    278499009Episodic (qualifier value)
    255238004Continuous (qualifier value)
    7087005Intermittent (qualifier value)
